title: Surgical Clinical Education Program Utilizing Remote Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and human anatomy comprehension
context.additional_context: Education focused on strengthening clinical judgment skills based on surgical scenarios in non-face-to-face environments

learning_goals: Analyze patient symptoms and establish diagnostic hypotheses with over 85% accuracy in virtual surgical simulation environments
Apply non-technical skills (teamwork, communication, decision-making) three or more times through crisis simulation scenarios
Master postoperative care protocols by completing over 90% of microlearning content provided on mobile platforms
Demonstrate clinical reasoning ability with a formative assessment achievement score of 70 or above
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
